name: Night Shift (itch) (dardanbujupaj)
description:
Please play in Fullscreen for best experience!

Today you started your new job at the burger dine-in. Your boss left early and you're alone for the night shift.
Suddenly you hear a rumbling at the front door... The doors are kicked in and a horde of zombies is approaching you. The only thing you can use to defend yourself is your BunGun 9000, a gun for shooting burger-buns into ingredients.

Controls:

  • Use WASD/Arrow keys to move around.
  • Aim, by moving the mouse.
  • Use the left mouse button to shoot.
  • Use the right mouse button to dodge your enemies.

Note: When hitting an ingredient with a burger, the ingredient is added to the burger and makes it stronger. Burgers with >2 ingredients explode on impact.

This is my entry for the Godot Wild Jam 26. Have fun playing!
